00023 #ifndef __libconfig_parsectx_h
00024 #define __libconfig_parsectx_h
00025 
00026 #include "libconfig.h"
00027 #include "strbuf.h"
00028 
00029 struct parse_context
00030 {
00031   config_t *config;
00032   config_setting_t *parent;
00033   config_setting_t *setting;
00034   char *name;
00035   strbuf_t string;
00036 };
00037 
00038 #define parsectx_init(C)                        \
00039   memset((C), 0, sizeof(struct parse_context))
00040 #define parsectx_cleanup(C)                             \
00041   free((void *)(strbuf_release(&((C)->string))))
00042 
00043 #define parsectx_append_string(C, S)            \
00044   strbuf_append(&((C)->string), (S))
00045 #define parsectx_take_string(C)                 \
00046   strbuf_release(&((C)->string))
00047 
00048 #endif /* __libconfig_parsectx_h */
